name: Rayleigh-Taylor Instability
description: A time step of a density field in a simulation of the mixing transition in Rayleigh-Taylor instability.
acknowledgement: Andrew W. Cook, William Cabot, and Paul L. Miller

bibtex.title: The Mixing Transition in {R}ayleigh-{T}aylor Instability
bibtex.author: Cook, Andrew W. and Cabot, William and Miller, Paul L.
